name: The Good Dinosaur Online Trivia | G | 10 Questions

questions.text: In what order were Henry and Ida's children born in "The Good Dinosaur"?
questions.explanation:
Libby, Buck, Arlo.

	Henry and Ida were a married Apatosaurus couple. All three of Henry and Ida's children were born on the same day. Libby was born first, Buck was born second, Arlo was born third. Arlo's egg was the largest of the three eggs, but he was the smallest of the three dinosaurs.

questions.text: Who was the critter that Arlo found out was stealing food from him and his family?
questions.explanation:
Cave boy.

	Henry gave Arlo the task of capturing and killing the critter who was stealing their food. When Arlo captured the critter, he couldn't kill it. Instead, he let the critter go. Henry became upset with Arlo and took Arlo along to capture the critter and kill him.

questions.text: While out looking for the critter, how did Henry die?
questions.explanation:
Flash flood swept him away.

	Henry was upset that Arlo let the critter get away so he took Arlo with him to look for the critter and kill him. A bad storm came through while Henry and Arlo were looking for the critter. When Arlo slipped and hurt his leg, Henry turned them both back. Unfortunately, Henry slipped on rocks when a flash flood came through and the rush of water swept him away.

questions.text: After getting separated from his family, Arlo became hungry. What did the critter first bring Arlo to eat?
questions.explanation:
Lizard.

	While Arlo chased the critter he blamed for his father's death, Arlo fell into the river and got swept downstream. While trying to find a way back home, Arlo became hungry. The critter first brought Arlo a lizard. When Arlo wouldn't eat the lizard, the critter brought Arlo a beetle. After the beetle, the critter brought Arlo a stalk of berries. Arlo ate the berries and then the critter showed Arlo where he could get more berries.

questions.text: When Arlo and the critter met Forest Woodbrush what friend, sitting on one of his spikes, did the Styracosaurus say did nothing to protect him?
questions.explanation:
Debbie.

	Arlo and the critter met Forest Woodbrush after running away from a snake. Forest introduced Arlo and critter to his friends sitting on Forest's spikes. There was Fury, who protected Forest from creatures, Destructor, who protected Forest from mosquitoes, and Dream Crusher, who protected Forest from unrealistic goals. When Forest introduced Debbie, he didn't describe her.

questions.text: With the help of Forest Woodbrush, what does Arlo name the critter?
questions.explanation:
Spot.

	Arlo and Forest Woodbrush threw out names to call the critter. Forest wanted to keep the critter to help defend him. Arlo chose the name Spot and Forest conceded that Spot and Arlo belonged together.

questions.text: Sam Elliot voiced Butch on "The Good Dinosaur". What species of dinosaur was Butch?
questions.explanation:
Tyrannosaurus.

	Butch. with two other Tyrannosauruses. had a herd of longhorns they were looking after. Arlo and the critter helped Butch get the herd back from Velociraptors in exchange for helping Arlo and the critter find their way home.

questions.text: On the critter and Arlo's way back home, they were attacked by the Pterodactyls that tried to kill the critter earlier.
questions.explanation:
True.

	The pterodactyls were using the storm clouds to hide in while they stalked Arlo and the critter. When they attacked, Downpour and Coldfront went after Arlo while Thunderclap grabbed the critter. Arlo tracked them to the shore where he knocked Downpour and Coldfront into the water. Critter bit a hole into Thunderclap's wing and Arlo was able to use that to knock Thunderclap into the water. Arlo saved the critter from drowning when he wrapped himself around the critter as they were swept down a waterfall.

questions.text: How did Arlo and the critter know that critter wasn't the only one of his kind out there?
options: Something saved the critter from drowning.
Arlo and the critter found a dwelling.
Butch told them there were more like the critter out there.
questions.explanation:
Something howled after critter howled.

	Once, the critter howled and something howled back. Critter saw someone that looked like him far away. Critter wanted to go, but Arlo stopped him. While headed back to Arlo's home after almost drowning, Arlo and the critter saw the same person again. This time Arlo made the critter stay, showing him that critter had a new family now.

questions.text: What was Arlo's mother doing when Arlo returned to their farm?
questions.explanation:
Clearing the garden.

	After saying goodbye to the critter, Arlo followed the river home. Arlo's mom was clearing the garden when she looked up and saw Arlo coming toward her. Arlo was able to make his print between his dad's print and his mom's print when he returned home.
